about_the_game:
About the game


Follow the days of a lonely writer, who dreams of writing her first book
and search for words of faith, perseverance and reflections on life.
The circumstances of everyday and trips to her favorite places will give
you all the inspiration needed to complete her desire.

Gameplay


"Life is like the wind, we are like leaves in the wind.
There is no way to know where the wind will blow
just as we cannot know where life will take us.
We can only resist the wind or get carried away by it. "

The text above explains the purpose of this game.

Control a small leaf that is blown in several directions by the wind.
Your task is to collect various items scattered around the scenary that symbolize the
ideas and inspirations that the writer needs to complete her book.

Perform various maneuvers, dodge obstacles!


Feel the wind blow in several directions, adapt to the circumstances.
Gain speed in free falls or fly downwind.
Control your acceleration by resisting and flying against the wind.

short_description: A relaxing, but challenging 3D game with low poly visuals and engaging music, where you take control of a small leaf, which flies in the direction that the wind blows, collecting items scattered around the scenary to help a young writer finish her book.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, German, Korean, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
